en.title: calculate your logia

about.title: what are we doing here?
features: 1 at the moment you were born, the configuration of the universe was in a specific state — one that could only be reproduced if the universe had an infinite amount of time
2 this state acts as a map, composed of a vast set of variables that determine the main attributes shaping your existence and choices
3 with this cosmic blueprint, we will unveil the mysteries of the past and decipher the future — through our groundbreaking new language

en.disclaimer: if you don't know your exact time and place of birth, you can still get a general sense of your logia, but some features may not function as intended
